t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: Hi Marcella, Yes, you can install the BOCCHI sink as a vessel in a bathroom, and as an undermount. But, the drain is the standard 3 1/2" Kitchen drain, so a faucet with the 1 1/2" drain, or pop up system will not fit.
